idea:
SWASTIK SYNERGY ENGINEERING PVT. LTD. (SSE) is amongst the leading INDIAN Manufacturer of Fire Fighting Appliances, Equipment & Fire Protection Systems confirming to national and international Standards and regulations. SSE`s Products and activities consist of:  
1. CO2 FIRE EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM(UL LISTED),  
2. KITCHEN HOOD FIRE SUPPRESSION SYSTEM(UL LISTED), 
3. FIRE EXTINGUISHERS(UL LISTED),  
4. CLEAN AGENT FIRE EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM, 
5. FIRESSENSE TUBE SYSTEM 
6. WATER MIST SYSTEM (FM APPROVED) 
7. INERT GAS EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM 
   
SSE`S manufacturing and warehousing facility is located at Khopoli near Mumbai. The laboratory at the factory is equipped with Test equipment’s and performance measuring equipment’s for all the products manufactured. Team of SSE is conscious of quality control and the same is implemented at every stage right from purchasing of raw material to final performance of product. SSE is approved by PESO for filling and storing of firefighting gases. SSE is SSI unit and has adopted ISO 9001-2008 and is registered with NSIC.
name: Swastik Synergy

idea:
Yoko Aviation Private Limited is a recruitment staffing & consulting company based in Mumbai and specialises in providing skilled personnel to the aviation industry.

We have created an online platform for candidates in airline industry using Artificial Intelligence specifically Augmented Intelligence. This will help automate the workflow to more effectively engage, screen and assess candidates for high volume tasks and ensure quality of hire through standardized job matching.
name: Yoko Aviation
